// wrangler.toml - Cloudflare Configuration
name = "nexus-nair-api"
main = "src/index.js"
compatibility_date = "2024-11-12"
account_id = "ad41fcfe1a84b27c62cc5cc9d590720e"

[[ d1_databases ]]
binding = "DB"
database_name = "nexus_nair_db"
database_id = "YOUR_D1_DATABASE_ID"

[[ r2_buckets ]]
binding = "STORAGE"
bucket_name = "nexus-nair-storage"

[vars]
PAYPAL_BUTTON_ID = "K65YZZXSGZ7U"
CARE_PERCENTAGE = "0.15"
PULSE_INTERVAL = "9"
GRAIN_PRECISION = "0.01"

/**
 * 🔥 UNIVERSAL HOTSTACK ENGINE v3.0
 * 
 * Connects ALL systems:
 * - Your 82 GitHub repos
 * - Your 21M+ Drive files  
 * - Your deployed infrastructure
 * - Your 13,713 brands
 * - Your 17,000 templates
 * 
 * Delivers ACTUAL 3-minute deployment
 */

// AI's understanding path:
1. Access: My Drive
2. Recognize: "codenest_drive_full_ecosystem" folder
3. Read: README.md (master navigation file)
4. Understand: Everything inside IS CodeNest ecosystem
5. Navigate: Based on structured folders
6. Connect: Systems using integration maps

AI Understanding:
1. Location: Codenest_drive_data/
2. Recognition: "I am now inside the CodeNest ecosystem"
3. Rule: Everything here is interconnected CodeNest data
4. Strategy: Go DEEPER to find MORE STRUCTURE
5. Reading: The deeper I go, the more organized it becomes

// OLD THINKING (Wrong):
User uploads file 
→ Generate everything from scratch ❌
→ Build HTML/CSS/JS ❌  
→ Create brand logic ❌
→ Deploy new code ❌
= Takes forever, inconsistent

// NEW UNDERSTANDING (Correct):
User uploads file
→ Extract business intent ✅
→ PULL from Codenest Drive ✅
   ├─ Templates (17,000+ ready)
   ├─ Brand data (13,713+ verified)
   ├─ Python algorithms (pre-built)
   ├─ JSON configurations (pre-made)
   └─ Replit apps (80+ deployed)
→ INJECT user data into placeholder ✅
→ DEPLOY (already built code) ✅
= 180 seconds ✅

Phase 1: INHALE (0-60s)
- User uploads file
- Extract business intent with AI
- Identify industry, type, location

Phase 2: HOLD (60-120s)  
- Pull template from Codenest Drive (17K+ options)
- Verify brand name (LicenseVault 13,713+)
- Clone Replit app (80+ deployed options)
- Get algorithm (Python files in Drive)

Phase 3: EXHALE (120-180s)
- Inject user data into placeholders
- Deploy to edge (R2 + Cloudflare)
- Create DNS hook (VaultDNS)
- Register ClaimRoot
- Return live URL

// WHAT EXISTS:
- GitHub webhook handling ✅
- File upload processing ✅
- LicenseVault verification ✅
- KV/R2 storage ✅
- Status endpoints ✅

// WHAT'S PLACEHOLDER:
- Template selection ⚠️
- DNS automation ⚠️
- ClaimRoot registration ⚠️
- Replit integration ⚠️
